HeroDesc: All courses for students, from beginners who are learning Korean to those who wish to learn the Korean language to the fullest, can be viewed on this website.
red-text: Unlock your potential. Learn, grow, and succeed â€” one step at a time.
who-desc: We are a dedicated Korean language online teaching class, developed to:
who-content1: Support unemployed individuals to find suitable employment in Korea
who-content2: Increase economic benefits to Sri Lanka
who-content3: Provide opportunities in Korea for skilled labour and professionals
who-content4: Improve village economies to industrial and mechanical economies
who-content5: Enhance cross-cultural understanding and global citizenship through language education
who-content6: Empower youth and women by providing accessible Korean language learning pathways
services-content1: We provide Korean language proficiency in written, spoken and comprehension for all types and ages of individuals
services-content2: We provide guidance to those seeking to travel to Korea for work, migration or studentship with country, living, study, work and lifestyle information
services-content3: We provide access to learning portals, sample proficiency examination training, language dictionary and other language services at no additional cost
services-content4: We also provide support in obtaining information on available opportunities in Korea for Sri Lankans such as professional and skilled job opportunities
benefits-content1: Courses are available for Korean speaking skills
benefits-content2: Providing sufficient reference time for all courses
benefits-content3: Courses designed for beginners in the Korean language
benefits-content4: Ability to view all courses up to citizenship
benefits-content5: Gathering scattered facts about Korea in one place
benefits-content6: Special discounts for students who have taken one of our courses
benefits-content7: Intervening in issues within or outside the workplace
benefits-content8: Ability to stay on during unemployment
benefits-content9: Guide to long-term visas in Korea
benefits-content10: Guidance for student visas in Korea
benefits-content11: Fast and easy to contact at any time
our-monk-desc: Venerable Kalyanapura Mangala Thero has been living in South Korea for almost 15 years. He is a graduate of the University of Kelaniya. After completing the Korean language course at Widok University in South Korea in 2010, he obtained a Bachelor of Arts and a Master of Arts in Buddhist Culture and graduated from the university in 2016. He has also built a temple in the Daegu area for Sri Lankans who left the university in 2016. He has written several books on the Korean language for children studying the Korean language and is conducting lectures using videos related to the Korean language. He has also been working as a registered educational interpreter with the Korean government for several years. He was also named as a Sri Lankan guide for the Korean National Parks in 2025.
our-monk-desc2: He has also received the highest awards from the Parliament, the City Council and the South Korean Police in recognition of his service not only to Sri Lankans but also to Korean society.
f-desc: Join live Korean classes anytime, anywhere. Build your skills with expert teacher, interactive lessons, and a supportive community. Start your journey today!
